reviews.review: One of my favorite games out there, the sci-fi puzzle game involving a blue and an orange portal is incredible, I’ve played the first one and the second one, I hope in the future, another game will come out!!!!
i like the part where he kills you
好玩是真的好玩，但是我玩的头晕。每次玩半小时就晕。
si vous êtes streamer et vous cherchez un jeu pour stream. Qui serait une aventure solo et énigme, ce jeux serait pour vous! Il y a aussi de l'actions bien sur!

Uma experiencia ainda mais agradável e desafiadora que o primeiro jogo, toda nova mecânica é implementada de um jeito incrível, e as mecânicas prévias melhoradas, o carisma dos novos personagens e a trilha sonora também deixam evidente o carinho colocado na criação desse jogo, a trilha sonora reativa e a história envolvente só tornam tudo ainda melhor, vale a pena para qualquer jogador.
Who worked in this game need an oscar so much intelligence and new concept Super Game .
Fun puzzle solving game with a sense of humor.

Jogo ótimo, os cenários são incríveis e os personagens divertidos. É muito bom pra passar o tempo.
This game is very fun! i recommend for two people commonly because you can play with friends!

Ну что сказать игра хорошая сюжет бомба но вы врятли поймёте его если не играли в старый Portal,совет ознокомиться с сюжетом Portal если вы в него не играли или же не знаете сюжет игры а потом проходить Portal 2. :), Надеюсь чуть помог.

funny
first valve game i played, was wonderful
such a nostalgic game for me great to come back to every once and a while
I played a single player run and had some laughs and enjoyed it a lot. the only downside is that I can't play again because I get blue screened.

La verdad que este juego esta muy bien echo para su epoca, yo al principio lo jugue para completarlo debido a que antes no lo pude completar y hoy mismo lo complete me trajo mucha felicidad y tristeza a la ves.
Les recomiendo que lo jueguen van a pasar un buen rato y se tomen el tiempo para ver cada cosa y formar un lazo, les recomiendo que duren unas 20 horas de modo campaña (yo tarde menos por que cierta parte la habia jugado en mi consola), en fin se los recomiendo

Its very good, especially if you like lore
legal o jogo a gameplay tem um tempo rasuavel mas recomendo para jogadores que estão dedicados a ficar um bom tempo pensando no puzzes

It's a challenging puzzle game while still being easy enough to do it without any guidance. It has so much content, even extending to an entire list of multiplayer levels, giving you such a big game to play. The graphics are phenomenal considering the game's age, everywhere you are feels realistic, and the humor is on point.
An amazing sequel to portal! Probably one of the best games of all time! Highly Recommend.

The sequel to the best puzzle game of all time.

WARNING - to fully experience or complete all achievements you dont need a friend . you can play with any random too :)
One of the best games Valve has ever created. Sequel when?
красиво и клево! советую для развития внимания и реакции!
really fun game for how old it is
one of the best games ever,  now fix tf2 valve

This game is the definition of "creepy fun."
The lore behind the labatory is amazing, pair that with the okay graphics and gameplay, it makes it the best game i have ever tried.

Co-op can be a pain with strangers, but with friends its way too much fun.

Plus, if you get bored of the game, you can always use the community workshop to download new levels!

This game... The lore... The environments... The fact that it takes you back to the 1950's, 60's, 70's test chambers deep underground... everything is just so damn badass. The ending was... alright. Typical cryptic Valve fashion.

𝑨𝒃𝒔𝒐𝒍𝒖𝒕𝒆𝒍𝒚 𝒚𝒆𝒔, 𝒉𝒐𝒎𝒊𝒆.
𝑾𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝒂𝒓𝒆 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒘𝒂𝒊𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒇𝒐𝒓?

从你在Aperture Science醒来的那一刻直到制作人名单出现，《传送门2》表现始终如一地出色。世界更大、故事更丰富，角色发展更让人惊。Aperture Science的控制者GLaDOS被打造成多种预料不到的形式，被赋予了很搞笑的性格。当你不是盯着屏幕皱着眉冥思苦想谜题时，《传送门2》一般都会让你大笑。
　　你扮演的依然是Chell，在一代的时间后再次被拽回了Aperture Science。你很快遇到了Wheatley，一个球体机器人，由Stephen Merchant配音。它会在前几关给你帮助。Stephen Merchant的配音很有激情，说明他对这一角色很有爱，而这也提高了游戏的质量。你会像期待解决谜题一样期待Wheatley会怎样语出惊人，特别是在Wheatley和GLaDOS进行友好的争论时。
　　Valve对于《传送门2》自始至终的细节重视令人震惊。Aperture Science在游戏一开始处于失修的状态。一旦GLaDOS开始工作，Aperture也就活过来了，并成为了GLaDOS身体和性格的延伸。随着游戏的进展，环境由封闭狭小的试验室变成了开裂的地下裂缝。《传送门》的核心魅力绝不在于视觉上，但我们还是不禁惊叹Valve竟然把已有7年历史的Source引擎发挥到如此惊人的地步。
I've heard so many good things about this game over the years and trust me, it lives up to the hype
A great sequel to a good game, and it implements new concepts and more fun puzzles. The ending is beautiful and rewarding after completing the game.
